title: Official Model Context Protocol Repositories
body:
Key official repositories for Model Context Protocol (MCP) development and reference:

## Core Repositories

### MCP Servers Collection
- **URL**: https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/servers
- **Purpose**: Official collection of MCP servers and examples
- **Content**: Reference implementations, server templates, community contributions
- **Use Case**: Find existing MCP servers, learn implementation patterns, contribute new servers

### MCP Specification
- **URL**: https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/specification
- **Purpose**: Official MCP protocol specification and documentation
- **Content**: Protocol definitions, API specifications, standards documentation
- **Use Case**: Understanding MCP protocol, implementing compliant servers/clients

### TypeScript SDK
- **URL**: https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/typescript-sdk
- **Purpose**: Official TypeScript SDK for MCP development
- **Content**: TypeScript libraries, utilities, development tools
- **Use Case**: Building MCP servers and clients in TypeScript/JavaScript

## Development Workflow
1. **Start with Specification**: Review protocol requirements and standards
2. **Explore Servers**: Find existing implementations and patterns
3. **Use TypeScript SDK**: Leverage official tools for rapid development
4. **Contribute Back**: Share useful servers with the community

## Additional Resources
- Organization: https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol
- Community: Active development and contributions welcome
- Documentation: Comprehensive guides and API references available
semanticSummary: Key official repositories for Model Context Protocol (MCP) development and reference:
